Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in our technical publications! We’ve attached a copy of the quote for the technical publications you’ve requested.
<insert technical publication (publication no.) and quote (quote no.)
We’ll connect all of your quote details through the subject line of this email. So, when you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
How to proceed with your order with:
Purchase Orders - Reply to this email and attach your purchase order.
Check or Wire Transfer - Reply to this email and attach your payment confirmation.
Credit Cards - Payments are processed through a Honeywell agent. Please call us at 1-800-601-3099 and provide your quote or unique tracking number.
To proceed with your order, simply reply to this email and specify your preferred method of payment. Payments by credit card are processed through a Honeywell agent.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Honeywell Aerospace Technical Publications Team Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com 1-800-601-3099 or internationally at 1-602-365-3099
